jei.vault_work_station.relic_fragment.de: a relic fragment obtained by smelting a relic fragment
jei.vault_work_station.particle_fragment: a particle fragment obtained by smelting a companion relic or particle trail
jei.vault_work_station.companion_essence: an essence obtained by smelting a companion through the companion recycler.
jei.vault_work_station.smelter_block.des: Vault Companion Recycler to cycle your companion for essence
